description: The Minister of Environment during the events of Ga-Rei -Zero- and Fujiko Mine`s other granddaughter. Despite being confined to a wheelchair, she is nice and kind-hearted person with a relaxed air. While likeable, she is very serious and earns her respect from her subordinates. Her personal assistant is Kiri Nikaidou who she affectionately calls "Kiri-chan."
name: Jinguuji Ayame
